## 1. Getting started

### 1.1 Installing and loading of R packages



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(haven, SmartEDA,tidyverse, tidymodels,ggridges, colorspace)
```
:::



#### 1.2  Importing data



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```
:::



### 1.3 Visualing the target



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = exam,
       aes(x = ENGLISH,
           y = CLASS)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = exam, aes(x = ENGLISH, y = CLASS)) +
  geom_density_ridges(
    scale = 3,
    rel_min_height = 0.01,
    bandwidth = 3.4,
    fill = lighten("#7097BB", .3),
    color = "white"
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    name = "English grades",
    expand = c(0, 0)
  ) +
  scale_y_discrete(
    name = NULL, 
    expand = expansion(add = c(0.2, 2.6))
  ) +
  theme_ridges()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex04_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
